step_into_world: Step into the world of elite gaming with our exclusive VIP Program, where your loyalty is rewarded with bigger bonuses, exclusive promotions, and premium perks.
every_bet: Every bet brings you closer to bigger rewards, ensuring you always get the best experience possible.
lucky_spin_description: Hit VIP 4 and gain access to Lucky Spin - your chance to win extra rewards every single day!
jester_description: Every tap on the Jester drops a reward - but hurry, this trickster won't stick around forever!
weekly_cashback_description: Reach VIP 12 and unlock Weekly Cashback, your personal safety net for high-roller action.
airdrop_description: Once a month, a mystery lands in your account
cannon_description: A reward so powerful, so exclusive, that its true nature remains a closely guarded secret.
